When we talk about life and its origins, we think of humans or animals. And the plants? They are only the subject of botany, in philosophy they play no role since Aristotle's idea of a vegetative soul faculty. Hard to believe, because they are the actual creators of the world. They cannot move and yet they are ingenious craftsmen, they mediate between earth and sun and possess hidden second bodies in the soil. Emanuele Coccia gives the reader a new awareness of the fascinating beauty of nature. Because plants are more than blooming coincidence, they are the basis of all life and therefore indispensable for our knowledge about us.

Emanuele Coccia "Die Wurzeln der Welt: Eine Philosophie der Pflanzen" by @hanserliteratur available @kunsthaus_shop accompanying "Formafantasma Seeing The Wood For The Trees"

All products from @kunsthaus_shop can also be ordered by e-mail (register@kunsthaushamburg.de), phone (+4940 335803) or PN! Pickup or delivery!

Il tema Next Generation Governance and Young Global Public Administration: Mobilizing People, Skills, Energies for a Sustainable New Normal ruota intorno a tre parole chiave: nuova generazione, globale e nuova normalità.

🔹 La #nuovaGenerazione è la prima parola chiave. Che si parli di #millennials, #natividigitali o #generazioneZ, si ritiene che questa generazione sia abbastanza diversa dalle precedenti in termini di bisogni, valori, comportamenti e capacità da avere un impatto dirompente sulla pubblica amministrazione, sulla #governance e sulle politiche pubbliche.

🔹 La seconda parola chiave è #globale. Ci si aspetta che questa nuova generazione, preoccupata per il #cambiamentoclimatico e le sfide poste dallo #svilupposostenibile, coinvolta in comunità globali di valori, veda la governance pubblica come un fenomeno prima di tutto globale, solo pragmaticamente sensibile alle differenze regionali o nazionali.

🔹 La terza parola chiave è #nuovanormalità, poiché si parte dal presupposto che la pandemia da COVID-19 avrà conseguenze #dirompenti sulle nostre vite nel lungo periodo, e ciò suggerisce:
• Un affidamento sempre maggiore sugli strumenti #4IR nelle nostre vite, quali: videoconferenze, riconoscimento facciale, geolocalizzazione, servizi di streaming;
• Organizzazione resiliente delle nostre vite, con periodi di lavoro in ufficio alternati a periodi di isolamento, con la possibilità che non si possa viaggiare a causa di #lockdown, con livelli variabili di #distanziamento sociale;
• Politiche macroeconomiche diverse, con offerta di moneta crescente, elevati livelli di debito degli attori economici, elevati livelli di inflazione, e un mercato delle #criptovalute in crescita.
.
Vuoi saperne di più? Partecipa alla IAAS EUROMENA 2022 Conference presso Università di Roma Tor Vergata e Luiss Guido Carli il 27-30 giugno! 👇

これから益々楽しみです☺️✨

Was macht die Arbeit bei der hkp/// group aus?  Hier muss Laura, die zunächst zwei Jahre #Werkstudentin bei uns war und nach ihrer Promotion als #Manager und #TeamLead bei uns anfing, nicht lange nachdenken:

„Mich reizt die Vielfältigkeit der Themen: Bei Projekten zur #Vorstandsvergütung lernt man unterschiedliche Unternehmensstrategien kennen, tariert Investorenerwartungen aus und wendet die neuesten regulatorischen Anforderungen an.“

Laura ist in unserem Bereich #BoardServices tätig und berät insbesondere börsengelistete Unternehmen bei der Ausgestaltung der Vorstands- und Aufsichtsratsvergütung.

Sie studierte #Betriebswirtschaftslehre an der @goetheunifrankfurt (B.Sc. und M.Sc.) mit dem Schwerpunt #Management und Accounting.

Anschließend promovierte sie dort am Lehrstuhl für #CorporateGovernance und #Wirtschaftsprüfung und veröffentlichte Ihre Dissertation mit dem Titel „Vorstandsvergütung als Mechanismus der Corporate Governance – Grundsätze für die Konzeption und Publizität der Vorstandsvergütung in Deutschland“.

Hast Du Lust mit Laura zusammenzuarbeiten und von ihr zu lernen? Dann bewirb Dich bei uns! 

Wir freuen uns über Deinen Besuch auf hkp.com/karriere und Deine Kontaktaufnahme.

📞Gerne beantworten wir Dir Deine Fragen direkt telefonisch.

Formafantasma, Cambio – on Finnish forestry / Helsinki Design Museum June 10 – August 28, 2022

Pulp wood and the pulp industry

Historically, the Finnish wood-processing industry began with sawmilling. Nowadays the most important export products of Finnish forest industry are pulp, paper, paperboard, packaging materials and sawn wood. Products of the pulp and paper industries account for about three quarters of all forest industry products. The raw material of the pulp and paper industry consists of small-diameter timber, which is often called fibrewood and is mostly sourced from thinnings and from the tops of mature trees.

The local pulp and paper industry is dominated by three major groups: UPM, Stora Enso and Metsä Group. In 2018 Finland had 19 pulp mills (many integrated), 17 paper mills and 14 paperboard mills. Out of these 9 are owned by UPM, 15 by Stora Enso and 12 by Metsä Group (Metsä Board, Metsä Fibre and Metsä Tissue). Stora Enso and UPM are number two and three in Europe, seven and eight in the world.

Finnish companies are deeply involved in the expansion of the global paper industry in the Global South. Nordic firms and states took advantage of the global economic crises in the last decades of the twentieth century to establish a world-dominant pulp and paper sector, including related manufacturing and technology. This boosted the establishment of large-scale industrial tree plantations (ITP) in the Global South, often on tropical forest lands customarily owned by traditional populations. The Finnish presence in Brazil has been strong since the 1970s, when Aracruz, the first large-scale pulp mill based on eucalyptus plantations, was created.

This research is part of the exhibition „Cambio – on Finnish forestry“ in collaboration with the Finnish furniture company Artek. All videos and research materials are available at: www.cambio.website 
Formafantasma team: @simonballen @hannahsegerkrantz

@designmuseo_fi @artekglobal @artekhelsinki
#formafantasma #cambio #designmuseo #helsinki #artek #design #research #timber #collaboration #policymaking #governance #finnishforestry

Presentazione dei Corsi dei laurea magistrale Scuola Economia e Management:

• Scienze statistiche per le indagini campionarie,

• Management and Governance,

• International Accounting and management,

• Finance,

• Economics/MSc in Economics 

• Economia per l'ambiente e la sostenibilità,

• Economia e gestione degli Intermediari Finanziari.

A seguire, i referenti dei corsi di laurea e gli studenti tutor saranno a disposizione dei futuri studenti per rispondere alle loro domande.

Al termine dell’evento si terrà una visita guidata al Museo Civico.

ฉายภาพ ยุทธศาสตร์เพื่อความยั่งยืนของ "สยามพิวรรธน์" ยึดกรอบสากล ESG
อ่านลิงก์ข่าวในเว็บ คลิกอ่าน👉 https://www.thaiquote.org/content/247338
#สยามพิวรรธน์ #ความยั่งยืน #ESG #Environment #Social #Governance #ยุทธศาสตร์ #Thaiquote

Hoje, um dos principais debates em torno do tema é como aproximar as realidades de cada país do ESG. Como unir as pautas e as necessidades do Brasil com a agenda ESG, conectada com indicadores e prioridades globais? A resposta não está em excluir, mas em incluir.

A questão ambiental está “muito atrás” no Brasil, já que ainda há muita discussão sobre as melhores práticas no tema, acredita o CEO da Rede Brasil do Pacto Global da ONU, Carlo Pereira. 

Já na questão social, as leis trabalhistas, de segurança no trabalho e de saúde dão respaldo para as ações das companhias.

#esg #mudançasclimáticas #environmental #social #governance #netzero #desigualdade

Fonte: Fast Company 
Imagem: Chatchai Pripimuk/ Pexels

ACCOUNTABILITY and TRANSPARENCY
---------------------------------------------------------------
In attempt to strengthen my engagements on the policy component of the subject above, I have completed my course on: Behavioural Insights for Transparency and Accountability  by the Policy Innovation Centre of Nigerian Economic Summit Group and MacArthur Foundation. 

I have further understood the scientific approach and application of research to the subject.

WHAT IS THE VALUE OF A NIGERIAN'S VOTE

If you accept 10k to vote anyone, it means you have accepted to be paid N7 daily for the next four years.

If you accept 1k to vote anyone, it means you have accepted to be paid N1.46 daily for the next four years.

We all know this might last 8years.

So, WHAT IS THE VALUE OF YOUR VOTE?
The government declares the minimum wage to be N30,000 which means every citizen with a primary school certificate should be paid a minimum of 30k monthly.

Do the maths for 4years, that's 1.4million

1,440,000 yes!

So the next time someone offers to buy your vote, ask them to pay each of you 1.4m first, then you can zip any complains for the next four years.

In essence, your vote is highly valuable, don't sell it.

Delayed gratification is one way we can take back our nation from the wrong hands.

P.S vote buying/selling is a crime.

Asher Auta 
Political activist.

#politics #political #politicalactivist #government #governance #politicalparties #goviral #goodgovernance #gossip #vote #voting #votebuying #voteselling #voter #pvc #pvccampaign #iamnigeria

Formafantasma, Cambio – on Finnish forestry / Helsinki Design Museum June 10 – August 28, 2022

Clear cutting

Clearcutting is a method of tree removal where all trees in a large area are removed. This is the most common form of tree removal due to it being the easiest and most efficient way to handle lumber. Clearcutting it is often praised as a method that supposedly imitates natural cycles: in boreal regions, fire is a crucial disturbance factor that helps the natural regeneration of forests. However, fires leave burned organic matter on the soil, contributing to its renewal and chemical enrichment, and clearcutting does not.

According to the Finnish Forest Act 1093/1996 enforced by the Finnish Forest Center Metsäkeskus, forest renewal is mandatory after every felling. The minimum target density pursued with the most common method of re-generation – planting – ensures that each tree that is felled is replaced by at least four new trees.

The Finnish Forest Act was reformed in 2014, giving forest owners the option to choose between clearcutting, continuous cover silviculture and other forest management methods. This encouraged a shift away from the idea that forests need to be clearcut for renewal and timber extraction. Continuous forest coverage selects and fells individual large trees and has been observed to offer several favourable features, for example higher resistance against natural hazards such as insects, better adaptation potential to climate change, and higher environmental values.  Clearcutting focuses on quantity, while selective logging focuses on the quality of timber

This research is part of the exhibition „Cambio – on Finnish forestry“ in collaboration with the Finnish furniture company Artek. All videos and research materials are available at: www.cambio.website 
Source: Anssi Jokiranta
Formafantasma team: @simonballen @hannahsegerkrantz

@designmuseo_fi @artekglobal @artekhelsinki

♻️ ESG Insurer: June 2022 edition

In this month’s edition we bring you the shortlist for the inaugural ESG Insurer Awards, set to take place at the HAC on London’s City Road on 12 July.

The shortlist is based on public disclosures made by companies over the past 12 months as well as the results of our latest survey of how the global (re)insurance marketplace is adapting its attitudes and business models to focus on ESG.

In this month’s edition we also recap all the major industry initiatives unveiled over the past month as the sector continues to take steps to embed ESG into its operations, underwriting and investment processes.

June marked 10 years since the foundation of the UN’s Principles for Sustainable Insurance (PSI). One of the key initiatives to emerge under the PSI is the Net-Zero Insurance Alliance (NZIA), and central to the NZIA’s objectives is the drive to create a standardised methodology to measure the carbon emissions of a carrier’s underwriting portfolio.

In this month’s edition we examine progress to date in this objective, which when complete is expected to fundamentally change the way carriers underwrite.
This month also saw the formal launch of the Global Risk Modelling Alliance – we take a look at why this could play a major role in helping build risk knowledge across vulnerable countries. 

✅ For more details on the awards, which will be attended by over 300 market professionals, click here: https://lnkd.in/e7wRv2bc

#ESGInsurer #ESG #insurance #reinsurance #environment #environmental #social #governance #awards #awardsceremony

Governance🏢 - Um unsere Aktivitäten im Bereich ESG stetig voranzutreiben, haben wir eine Stelle geschaffen, die sich ausschließlich mit dem Thema beschäftigt. Anna ist unser ESG Impact Lead. Ihre Aufgabe ist es, bestehende Prozesse zu hinterfragen, in allen Geschäftsbereichen Bewusstsein für ESG zu fördern und neue Initiativen voranzutreiben. Unterstützt wird sie dabei vom FRIDAY ESG Circle. Diese Arbeitsgruppe besteht aus Kolleg:innen verschiedener Abteilungen, die nicht nur kritische Fragen stellen, sondern die Wichtigkeit des Themas ins Unternehmen tragen.

Du fragst dich jetzt: Was kommt als nächstes? Wir uns auch :) Deshalb arbeiten wir kontinuierlich daran, wie wir uns weiterentwickeln können.

Apa hal pertama yang muncul di pikiranmu saat mendengar kata “sustainability” (keberlanjutan)?

Berdasarkan pengamatan tim kami, kebanyakan dari kita spontan mengidentikkan sustainability dan menjawab dengan kata "lingkungan". Sebenarnya jawaban itu tidak salah, hanya saja kurang lengkap.

Sustainainability bukan hanya tentang lingkungan, tapi juga mencakup berbagai aspek kehidupan manusia dan planet bumi lainnya seperti sosial, tata kelola, ekonomi, bahkan budaya.

Seiring meningkatnya berbagai permasalahan hidup manusia akibat perubahan iklim dan ketimpangan sosial misalnya, kita semua dituntut untuk belajar tentang keberlanjutan. Wawasan tentang sustainability menjadi kebutuhan sangat penting pada profesi dan bidang kehidupan apa pun hari ini dan ke depan.

Para pembuat kebijakan, praktisi, profesional, akademisi, jurnalis, pengusaha, aktivis, mahasiswa, bahkan masyarakat awam perlu lebih memahami isu-isu seputar keberlanjutan, agar bisa meresponnya secara proporsional di kapasitas masing-masing. Hal ini juga akan memberi keuntungan kompetitif bagi pertumbuhan pribadi dan profesional kita semua, sehingga kita dapat berkontribusi lebih baik kepada masyarakat.

Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang sustainability dengan membaca artikel-artikel di Green Network ID dan Green Network Asia @greennetwork.asia (EN), platform terintegrasi untuk setiap orang bisa belajar, berbagi, dan berjejaring tentang sustainability dan pembangunan berkelanjutan. Klik tautan di bio kami 🌏🌱👶🏻✨

#greennetwork #greennetworkid #greennetworkasia #sustainability #sustainabledevelopment #SDGs2030 #sustainable #sustainableliving #environment #social #economic #governance #culture #sustainableworld #LeaveNoOneBehind #WhatIsSustainability #keberlanjutan #pembangunanberkelanjutan #pendidikan #advokasi #kesadaran

What is the first thing that comes to your mind when you hear the word “sustainability”?

Based on our team's observations, most of people spontaneously identify sustainability as "environment". Actually the answer is not wrong, it's just incomplete.

Sustainability is not only about the environment, but also includes various aspects of human life and other planet earth such as social, governance, economic, and even cultural.

Along with the increasing number of problems in human life due to climate change and social inequality, for example, we are all required to learn about sustainability. Insights about sustainability have become a very important need in any profession and field of life today and in the future.

Policy makers, practitioners, professionals, academics, journalists, entrepreneurs, activists, students, and even the general public need to better understand the issues surrounding sustainability, so that they can respond proportionally in their respective capacities. It will also provide a competitive advantage for the personal and professional growth of all of us, so that we can better contribute to society.

Learn more about sustainability by reading articles on Green Network Asia and Green Network ID @greenetwork.id (ID), an integrated platform for everyone to learn, share, and network about sustainability and sustainable development. Click the link in our bio

什麼是DAO (decentralized autonomous organization)？中國哲學中的”道”? 道是道，但非常道，DAO ，可能是未來機構管理的”道”。DAO 是去中心自治組織，一種因科技發展而衍生的全新機構管理模式。

機構嘅管治方式不斷隨時代演變，由工廠式高壓管治，到中心化集權管理，至現今最新型式的DAO 去中心自治模式。究竟孰優孰劣？DAO 在非科技或非財經行業還會有效嗎？

講東講西 (星期一至五)
數碼化下的機構管治
主持：黃仲遠、萬玉麟
嘉賓：李思聰
